summary.para: Contains classes which provide the functionality for DevExpress BarCodeControl and RangeControl.
Shows a calendar within the range control’s viewport.
Initializes a new instance of the class.
A Range Control.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Controls.RangeControl.AllowImmediateRangeUpdate

summary.para: Gets or sets whether changes to the selected or visible area via the user interface are being posted immediately or after the interaction is completed. This is a dependency property.

member.value: true, to post changes immediately; otherwise, false.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Controls.RangeControl.AllowScroll

summary.para: Gets or sets whether to allow horizontal scrolling. This is a dependency property.

member.value: true, to allow scrolling; otherwise, false.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Controls.RangeControl.AllowSnapToInterval

summary.para: Gets or sets whether to snap the selection thumbs to the bounds of the range items. This is a dependency property.

member.value: true, to snap the selection thumbs to the bounds of the range items; otherwise, false.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Controls.RangeControl.AllowZoom

summary.para: Gets or sets whether to allow zooming. This is a dependency property.

member.value: true, to enable the zoom feature; otherwise, false.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.
Gets or sets the object that visualizes the data within the RangeControl’s viewport. This is a dependency property.
Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Controls.RangeControl.Content

summary.para: Gets or sets the range control’s content. This is a dependency property.

member.value: An object that is the range control’s content.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Controls.RangeControl.EnableAnimation

summary.para: Gets or sets whether to enable animation. This is a dependency property.

member.value: true, to enable animation; otherwise, false. The default is true.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Controls.RangeControl.OutOfRangeAreaBrush

summary.para: Gets or sets the brush used to paint the viewport area out of the selected range. This is a dependency property.

member.value: A Microsoft.UI.Xaml.Media.Brush value.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Controls.RangeControl.RangeEnd

summary.para: Gets or sets the end bound of a range.

member.value: The end bound of a range.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Controls.RangeControl.RangeStart

summary.para: Gets or sets the start bound of a range.

member.value: The start bound of a range.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Controls.RangeControl.RangeThumbsBrush

summary.para: Gets or sets the brush used to paint the selection thumbs. This is a dependency property.

member.value: A Microsoft.UI.Xaml.Media.Brush value.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Controls.RangeControl.RangeThumbsHighlightBrush

summary.para: Gets or sets the brush used to paint the selection thumbs when panning a selected range. This is a dependency property.

member.value: A Microsoft.UI.Xaml.Media.Brush value.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Controls.RangeControl.SelectionRangeEnd

summary.para: Gets or sets the end bound of the selected range.

member.value: The end bound of the selected range.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Controls.RangeControl.SelectionRangeStart

summary.para: Gets or sets the start bound of the selected range.

member.value: The start bound of the selected range.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Controls.RangeControl.SelectionThumbStyle

summary.para: Gets or sets the style applied to selection thumbs. This is a dependency property.

member.value: A Microsoft.UI.Xaml.Style object specifies the style applied to selection thumbs.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Controls.RangeControl.ShowRangeBar

summary.para: Gets or sets whether to show the Zoom And Scroll Bar. This is a dependency property.

member.value: true, to show the Zoom&Scroll Bar; otherwise, false.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Controls.RangeControl.ShowRangeThumbs

summary.para: Gets or sets whether to show the selection thumbs within the viewport. This is a dependency property.

member.value: true, to show the selection thumbs; otherwise, false

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Controls.RangeControl.ShowSelectionRectangle

summary.para: Gets or sets whether to show the selection rectangle. This is a dependency property.

member.value: true, to show the selection rectangle; otherwise, false.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Controls.RangeControl.UpdateDelay

summary.para: Specifies the delay (in milliseconds) that occurs before passing the changes made in a Range Control to its associated client. This is a dependency property.

member.value: An integer value specifying the update delay, in milliseconds.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Controls.RangeControl.VisibleRangeEnd

summary.para: Gets or sets the end bound of the visible range.

member.value: The end bound of the visible range.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Controls.RangeControl.VisibleRangeStart

summary.para: Gets or sets the start bound of the visible range.

member.value: The start bound of the visible range.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.
This RangeControl client shows a range of numeric values. Each value is represented by a dot. Dots are connected by a continuous line. The areas above and below the line are of different colors.
Initializes a new instance of the class.
